869360.name: Attack of the Giant Mutant Lizard Demo
869360.description:
In this short 2.5D arcade/action game, control a giant mutant lizard to eat people, crush cars, and throw things with your mutant tail which has claws for some reason. Spend points on upgrades and new abilities and try to survive an increasingly deadly hail of bullets.

This demo contains:
  • Three Game modes:
    • Story Mode - Play as the lizard and rampage your way through the first two areas.
    • Arcade Mode - Try to survive as long as you can. No bosses. No cutscenes.
    • Practice Mode - Relax and practice your moves without getting shot at. Get a feel for the controls and throw stuff at targets.
  • Upgrades:
    Spend the points that you get from eating people to improve stats like health and armor, and unlock the ability to pick up cars and stomp on things.
869360.supported_languages: 英语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 德语
